summary: Danny and Beth must battle the Nazis after they use the puppets' life-giving serum to create a race of immortal soldiers, as well as some Nazi puppets.
cast: Kip Canyon|Jean Louise O'Sullivan|Oto Brezina|Scott King|Brad Potts|Kurt Sinclair|Stephanie Sanditz|Paul Thomas Arnold|Terumi Shimazu|Ian Roberts|Jesse Hlubik|Michael Ulmer|Glenn Zhang|Ryan Dillon|Steven Haworth|Cory Kipp|John Anthony Hackert|Martin Harris|Max Hermans|Samantha Holman|Kenichi Iwabuchi|Eli James|Danielle Stewart|Mike V. Szuc|Waymond Lee
title: Puppet Master X: Axis Rising
